projects.title: Store - Drink Yahweh
projects.description: WordPress and WooCommerce Store. A mobile-first WooCommerce store developed in WordPress, based on the client's design. Integrated payment gateway, animated product visuals, and a responsive layout ensure a modern, engaging shopping experience optimized for all devices.

projects.title: Clone - Calendly
projects.description: A visual clone of Calendlyâ€™s booking interface: users can select available dates and time slots and get simulated confirmations. Built with React, vanilla CSS, and custom animations, featuring an interactive calendar and responsive layout for a slick, modern UX

projects.title: Dibujo FÃ¡cil
projects.description: Dibujo FÃ¡cil is an interactive web platform that teaches drawing through step-by-step tutorials. I developed the full stack using React, Tailwind, Node.js, and MongoDB, and designed a clean, modern, and visually appealing interface focused on usability and user experience. Features include user accounts, level-based galleries, comments, ratings, and achievements. The cohesive, high-quality design enhances user engagement and retention across devices.
